instruction: Come up with a creative idea for a promo campaign for a smartphone.
output: A creative idea for a promotional campaign for a smartphone could be to set up a virtual scavenger hunt game where participants could search different areas of a virtual city in order to win a new phone. The game would require players to take pictures or videos, solve puzzles and complete challenges in order to obtain a secret code. Participants who complete the task within a certain time frame would win a new phone!
